body:
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Map List (Thanks Evocal!)
Fortress (Avicade, Minotaur)
Hazardous (Avicade, Minotaur)
Gether (Avicade, Minotaur)
Seashore (Avicade, Minotaur)

Color Explosion (Avicade, Red Alert)
Incendio (Avicade, Red Alert)

Rats (Avicade, OiTC)
Checkers (Avicade, OiTC)

Lectura (Control the Hill)
Quicksand (Control the Hill)
Bleened Rings (Nebula, DTM)
Dark Trot (Nebula, DTM)
Flowdren (Nebula, DTM)
Formorgar 2 (Nebula, DTM)
Justice 2 (Nebula, DTM)
Rabidus (Nebula, DTM)
The Future (Nebula, DTM)
TNT Warz (Nebula, TDM)

Cleyra (Nebula, OiTN)
Edron (Nebula, OiTN)
Meltinidus Frostlight (Nebula, OiTN) 

Caida Floral (Nexus)
Canyon (Nexus)
Ciutat (Nexus)
Tribus (Nexus)
The Division 3 (Nexus)
Seasons (Nexus)

Graveyard (The Walls)
Mesoplanet (The Walls)
Oz (The Walls)
Permafrost (The Walls)
Sewers (The Walls)
Walls MINI (The Walls)  

Times (Thanks howsie!): 
- 10:00 AM EST
 - 2:00 PM GMT

How to connect: Enter avic.us and do /server Mapdev!

Plug.DJ Event:
This is also accompanied with a plug.dj event at the same time! To connect to plug.dj, go to plug.dj/avicusand have your account name the same as your IGN. Rewards may be provided by directors such as a donor rank.

Hope to see you there!

replies.body:
Anyway.. I have a cold and breathing problems right now and am working off a 1 hour sleep just trying to cater to you guys and now it just so happens that everything is going wrong.. No directors are online, Evocal is off, hardly any staff members are on... and to top it all off, Github decided to break and nobody's responding to my skype messages. Plus, the rank can't be handed out if there's no directors. Even MapDev decided to break.



I will still try to do it as of course I don't like making false hype.. but it will most likely be on Iris and play Avicade/Nexus/Nebula, etc., not just strictly nebula. It's a disaster... but I will do my best with what I have.
replies.body_tagged:
Anyway.. I have a cold and breathing problems right now and am working off a 1 hour sleep just trying to cater to you guys and now it just so happens that everything is going wrong.. No directors are online, Evocal is off, hardly any staff members are on... and to top it all off, Github decided to break and nobody's responding to my skype messages. Plus, the rank can't be handed out if there's no directors. Even MapDev decided to break.



I will still try to do it as of course I don't like making false hype.. but it will most likely be on Iris and play Avicade/Nexus/Nebula, etc., not just strictly nebula. It's a disaster... but I will do my best with what I have.
